column1: What do you call it when Batman skips Church? \nChristian Bale.
What position did Bruce Wayne play on his little-league team? \n He was the bat-boy.
How does Batman's mother call him to dinner? \n (tune of 1960's theme) Dinner Dinner Dinner Dinner Batman!!!
Why did Bruce's date go badly? \n Because he has BAT breath!
What does Batgirl wear to bed? \n Her Dark Knight gown!
What's the difference between Batman and a robber? \n Batman can go into a store without robin!
What is a Batman's favorite part of the joke? \n The "punch" line!
What does Batman put in his beverages? \n Just ice.
When is Joker not plotting a murder? \n "When he's riding his Harley."!
What do you call a comic book movie without any sidekicks? \n Batman and Robinhood.
How many caped crusaders does it take to change a light-bulb? \n None. They like the dark.
What did Batman say to Robin before they got in the Batmobile? \n Get in the Batmobile Robin!
Why did Batman flush the toilet? \n Because it was his duty!
What is a Batman's favorite drink? \n Fruit punch!
When does Poison Ivy change her underpants? \n When they get soiled!

column8: it's evident the Lord is all-powerful and we are small and insignificant. Meteorologically

column1: What's 18 inches long and makes women scream all night? \n Crib death.
Where do you find a dog with no legs? \nRight where you left it.
What's red and orange and looks good on hippies? \nFire.
